page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: USK AREA - POST AND TELEPHONES. The postal service in this block comprises one delivery and two collections each day in the rural area (Sundays excepted), with one post box each at Llancayo, Gwehelog and near the Usk Agricultural College. The outskirts of Usk have two delivered and collections daily (Sunday excepted) with post boxes in the Abergavenny Rd, Castle Parade and Ladyhill. There is one Public Telephone box near the Agricultural College, in the layby past Prioress Mill Lane, and one each at Llancayo and near the Hall Inn, at Gwehelog. Most of the farms and houses in the rural area have telephones and many of the residents on the outskirts of Usk. The public telephones are used mostly by business representatives, lorry drivers and passing motorists.
